description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**教學目標****Objectives:**

  This course aims to help students to develop and improve their English abilities; meanwhile, it also helps to build up students’ confidence and interests in English. Student’s participation, discussion, and group activities in class will be the main focus of this course. Different activities will be offered to guide the students to apply basic English vocabularies, sentences, and grammar to build the familiarity toward English, including using different kinds of visual aids, games, and news...etc. Students will engage in different discussion and practice under the instructor’s guide to improve students’ English speaking, listening, writing, and reading abilities. In addition to understanding the grammar and vocabulary, students are required to have further critical thinking toward the issues, subjects, and contents given in class.

**上課要求與規則****Requirements and Rules:**

1.  If you want to succeed in this class, you need to be willing to devote time participating all the class activities, including discussion, practice, assignment, and presentation. **Your learning attitude is essential in this class**. You need to focus both on your attendance and class activities. Without joining any class activities, discussion, or practice, you won’t get a higher score for this class. **(****沒有參與課堂活動、討論或練習，也不會獲得高分****)**
2.  **Attendance is required**. **Missing 4 classes, without telling your teacher in advance( at least “a week” before your absence) with a proper reason, you will be failed for this class. Please note that if you’re late for more than 20 minutes, you’ll be absent for that class. For 1 absence, it costs you 2 points every time. (****缺席四次，在沒有以正當理由事先告知老師下，將無法通過此課程。遲到超過****20****分鐘視同缺席****。缺席一次扣****2****分****)**
3.  **Textbook is a must**. **Violation of this rule will cost you 1 point (out of your final score) each time**. (You can bring no textbook ONLY when teacher informs you!) **(****沒帶課本，每次扣總成績一分****)**
4.  **Autobiography and Self-introduction****自傳及自我介紹**: We don’t have midterm exam; instead, **you need to write your autobiography and make a brief self-introduction based on your autobiography in 1~2mins with simple slide (1~3 slides)**.
5.  **Final presentation** **期末團體報告**: **Followed by teacher’s instruction, each group needs to report and introduce the assigned article by teacher**. You’ll be scored on voc list, ppt, oral performance, man ideas, important/interesting messages, and individual explanation. (guide the whole class to read/understand the article) Further information will be given before your presentation.
6.  You **cannot** use your laptop or smart phone in class **without the teacher’s permission**. Violation of this rule will cost you **2** points each time.
7.  **Please check Moodle and e-mail frequently!** It’s your responsibility to make sure you register with the correct email address on Moodle. **Not receiving a notice or forgetting to check is NOT an excuse for any class activities. (****請隨時查****看****Moodle****及老師寄的****e-mail****!** **各種作業活動因沒有收到通知、不知道或忘了查看而沒做並不是理由。****)**
8.  **Our syllabus will be adjusted based on the real class schedule. (****實際上課進度將因上課狀況做調整****) Please make sure you read any notice from teacher’s mail or Moodle.**
9.  This course aims to offer a positive and comfortable learning environment for all the students to learn in a positive, relaxed, happy mood, so **please RESPECT your classmates, your teacher, and this class. Any serious violation of this class might cause great outcome on your final score. If you have any problems/questions, you are always welcome to talk to your teacher.**

**額外加分及補救活動****Extra bonus and Makeup activities:**

**A. Extra bonus**: Joining Oral Reading Competition (英文朗讀比賽) will gain **5 points** for your final score. (each class needs to have 3 students)

**B. Extra bonus and make up activities:** _If you have a bad performance in class, including your attendance, presentation, class participation, you need do 1 makeup activity.(You teacher will inform you in advance) For those who wants extra points for the final score, you can still do one of these activities._

Choose 1 out of the 3 makeup activities:

1.  **Lexile****讀本閱讀心得報告**: Choose a Lexile book of your Lexile level (based on your Lexile score). Read it, summarize the book, and write your feedback of the reading. You need to write in 500 words. You need to turn in your paper on the last day of this course.
2.  **參與英文活動或比賽並寫心得報告:**Attend a competition or event held in English and write your feedback on the experience in 500~600 words. You need to introduce the English activity (what is the activity about, what did you do there, what did you learn/gain…etc.) and write your thoughts/feedback about attending this activity. You need to turn in your paper on the last day of this course.
3.  **去英語自學教室學習英文****(****累積****10****小時****)**: Visit 英語自學教室 (本部樸 101) to use any on-line learning at least for 10 hours, including grammar, listening, and reading. (excluding movies) You don’t have to stay directly for 10 hours a day, it can be accumulated for several times. Please log into the system to record your visits and give me your records by the end of the class.
